projects.title: Technical Analysis Platform for Financial Markets (TAPFM)
description: Designed and developed a personal project for backtesting and analyzing trading strategies using real-world financial data.
Implemented event-driven data fetching with AWS Lambda and S3, storing and processing historical market data.
Built ETL jobs for sentiment scoring, indicator computation, and strategy evaluation.
Created a dashboard for midterm decision support, along with a strategy development and backtesting toolkit.
